TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInternalConfigWebHost

Docs.summary: Defines interfaces used by internal .NET Framework infrastructure for accessing and manipulating Host configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetConfigPathFromSiteIDAndVPath (string siteID, string vpath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetConfigPathFromSiteIDAndVPath(string siteID, string vpath) cil managed

Docs.param: The application's site identifier. For more information, see ASP.NET Configuration Overview.
The application's virtual path as a string. For more information, see ASP.NET Web Site Paths.
Docs.summary: Returns a value representing the path to a configuration file associated with the provided site identifier and application's virtual path.
Docs.returns: A string representing the path to a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetSiteIDAndVPathFromConfigPath (string configPath, out string siteID, out string vpath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetSiteIDAndVPathFromConfigPath(string configPath, string siteID, string vpath) cil managed

Docs.param: A string representing the path to the application's configuration file.
The application's site Identifier. For more information, see ASP.NET Configuration Overview.
The application's virtual path as a string. For more information, see ASP.NET Web Site Paths.
Docs.summary: Sets the current site identifier of a configuration object based on the application virtual path and the application configuration path.
